name: Skate Fever
description:
Skate as far as you can!

Jump over or slide under oncoming traffic and obstacles on the road.

Collect coins to unlock fun unique characters.

Features:

* Beautiful low-poly graphics
* Endless fun
* Multiple characters to choose from
* Challenge your friends for the highest score

Instructions:
- Touch and Hold to Slide
- Tap to Jump
- Double Tap to Double Jump
